item.title: Jon add a quote by Sherman Alexie
item.description: "Life is a constant struggle between being an individual and being a member of the community." -- Sherman Alexie

item.title: Jon add a quote by Cory Doctorow
item.description: "It's good versus evil, Dan. You don't want to be a post-person. You want to stay human. The rides are human. We each mediate them through our own experience. We're physically inside of them, and they talk to us through our senses. What Debra's people are building--it's hive-mind [stuff:]. Directly implanting thoughts! Jesus! It's not an experience, it's brainwashing!" -- Cory Doctorow

item.title: Jon add a quote by Sarah Vowell
item.description: "Behind every bad law, a deep fear." -- Sarah Vowell

item.title: Jon add a quote by Wendell Berry
item.description: "To define knowledge as merely empirical is to limit one's ability to know; it enfeebles one's ability to feel and think." -- Wendell Berry

item.title: Jon add a quote by Wendell Berry
item.description: "Beauty . . . cannot be interpreted. It is not an empirically verifiable fact; it is not a quantity." -- Wendell Berry

item.title: Jon add a quote by Malcolm Gladwell
item.description: "Who we are cannot be separated from where we're from." -- Malcolm Gladwell

item.title: Jon add a quote by Malcolm Gladwell
item.description: "I want to convince you that these kinds of personal explanations of success don't work. People don't rise from nothing....It is only by asking where they are from that we can unravel the logic behind who succeeds and who doesn't." -- Malcolm Gladwell

item.title: Jon add a quote by Malcolm Gladwell
item.description: "We overlook just how large a role we all play--and by 'we' I mean society--in determining who makes it and who doesn't." -- Malcolm Gladwell

item.title: Jon add a quote by Upton Sinclair
item.description: "It is difficult to get a man to understand something, when his salary depends on his not understanding it." -- Upton Sinclair

item.title: Jon add a quote by David Rhodes
item.description: "We are not separate, and I want you to know that. We are all part of one thing, and nothing good has ever passed or ever can pass away. There is no way out, but there is a way in, and when one person feels lonely like a ghost it touches us all." -- David Rhodes

item.title: Jon add a quote by David Rhodes
item.description: "We are all connected in ways we cannot even begin to fathom. Our lives unfold through each other and within each other. What one suffers, we all feel. What one does changes others forever." -- David Rhodes

item.title: Jon add a quote by David Rhodes
item.description: "Telling the truth is always wrong if it threatens those for whom being wrong can never be true." -- David Rhodes

item.title: Jon add a quote by Jo Walton
item.description: "Class is entirely intangible, and the way it affects things isn't subject to scientific analysis, and it's not supposed to be real but it's pervasive and powerful. See; just like magic." -- Jo Walton

item.title: Jon add a quote by Ludmilla Ulitskaya
item.description: "There is no escaping life. It takes what is it's due." -- Ludmilla Ulitskaya

item.title: Jon add a quote by Patrick deWitt
item.description: "We can all of us be hurt, and no one is exclusively safe from worry and sadness." -- Patrick deWitt
